job_details.Vacaturetitel: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes building user-facing applications powered by LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude, incorporating RAG-like concepts implicitly through 'autonomous tools and interactive features'. It requires full-stack development to integrate these AI capabilities into web applications, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile's focus on language, vision, and interaction specialists.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the creation and integration of software components, which is the core of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need for full-stack development skills, a key aspect of building complete applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This indicates direct work with LLMs for creating new AI-driven functionalities, which falls under generative modeling.
The creation of 'autonomous tools' and 'interactive features' implies the development or adaptation of AI models to perform specific tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This implies responsibility for the full lifecycle of the product, including deployment and maintenance, which is a component of MLOps.
Launching and iterating suggests involvement in the deployment and ongoing management of the product, aligning with MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase shows the need to understand the end-users' requirements and align technical solutions with those needs.
This directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions collaboration with diverse teams and the need for clear communication of complex ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of ongoing learning and adapting to new technologies in a fast-paced field.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a proactive approach and taking full responsibility for the development and success of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking abstract concepts and developing concrete, functional solutions, requiring problem-solving skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core activity of building and deploying software applications with a focus on user experience.
While broad, 'AI applications' implies the use and integration of AI models.

soft_skills.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates taking initiative and responsibility for the product's success.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the need for collaboration and effective communication across different roles and expertise levels.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the importance of staying current with new technologies and adapting to changes in the field.

soft_skills.phrase: take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products
soft_skills.justification: This describes the process of transforming abstract concepts into tangible, functional products, requiring problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.
